comments.body: Please find the fix for the issue. Please consider this for improvement in the next version of JackRabbit.

comments.author: Christophe Lombart
comments.body: Patch applied. Can you check if it is ok for you ? Thank

comments.author: Shrirang
comments.body: The patch is fine. Thank you. Do I have to close the issue ? What is the process ?

comments.author: Christophe Lombart
comments.body:
You can close issues when it is ok for you. 
Thanks

comments.author: Shrirang
comments.body: Verified the code and the test cases are running fine.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Merged to the 1.5 branch in revision 718217.

description: Added a convenience method to add Or Filter for the same property with multiple values. This is to simulate an IN Clause in JackRabbit.
summary: Convenience method to Or multiple values with a single filter
